sim.Controller

类 UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.Controller.UserController

  • @RestController
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Login and regist controller,witch is used to reply the request and update server.

      • login

        @PostMapping(value="/login")
public JSONResult login(@RequestBody
                                                      Users user)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Login json result.
        参数:
        user - the user
        返回:
        the json result
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • regist

        @PostMapping(value="/regist")
public JSONResult regist(@RequestBody
                                                        Users user)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Regist json result. Reply to request.
        参数:
        user - the user information
        返回:
        JSONResult message.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • searchUser

        @PostMapping(value="/search")
public JSONResult searchUser(java.lang.String myUserId,
                                                            java.lang.String friendUsername)
                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Search user with self id and friend user name.
        参数:
        myUserId - id of current user
        friendUsername - the friend username
        返回:
        JSONResult message.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

        userId2 - the user id 2

      • operFriendRequest

        @PostMapping(value="/operFriendRequest")
public JSONResult operFriendRequest(java.lang.String acceptUserId,
                                                                              java.lang.String sendUserId,
                                                                              java.lang.Integer operType)
        Send friend request from from my user id to friend user name.
        参数:
        acceptUserId - the user id of accepter
        sendUserId - the user id of sender
        operType - 0 for decline;1 for accept
        返回:
        JSONResult message.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
